data.text:
Haa, haa, haa…… 
Fu~~~…… …………
data.name: Rhein Kraft
data.processed:
<story>Haa, haa, haa…… 
<story>Fu~~~…… …………

data.text:
Hmmm~…… Kraft, you okay~? 
It kinda seems like you can't really concentrate right now~……
data.name: Antenna-haired Uma Musume
data.processed:
<story>Hmmm~…… Kraft, you okay~? 
<story>It kinda seems like you can't really concentrate right now~……

data.text:
You'll get hurt, so don't lose focus! 
Maybe it'd be best if you only did 1 more lap!
data.name: Single Knot Uma Musume
data.processed:
<story>You'll get hurt, so don't lose focus! 
<story>Maybe it'd be best if you only did 1 more lap!

data.text:
S-sorry about that……! 
I'll do that!!
data.name: Rhein Kraft
data.processed:
<story>S-sorry about that……! 
<story>I'll do that!!

data.text:
(Not good, I can't concentrate at all! The 『NHK Mile C』, huh…… 
but, I've always dreamed of 『Oaks』 so not participating is……)
data.name: Rhein Kraft
data.processed:
<story>(Not good, I can't concentrate at all! The 『NHK Mile C』, huh…… 
<story>but, I've always dreamed of 『Oaks』 so not participating is……)

data.text:
(Do I have to end my attempt at the Triple Tiara? 
A problem of aptitude……that might be true but……)
data.name: Rhein Kraft
data.processed:
<story>(Do I have to end my attempt at the Triple Tiara? 
<story>A problem of aptitude……that might be true but……)

data.text:
(But, it's a race after all, you won't know what the result 
is without running it, right? Not having the aptitude doesn't 
mean that……I'm guaranteed to not get results……)
data.name: Rhein Kraft
data.processed:
<story>(But, it's a race after all, you won't know what the result 
<story>is without running it, right? Not having the aptitude doesn't 
<story>mean that……I'm guaranteed to not get results……)

data.text: ……Nnnnnaaaaaa~~~!!
data.name: Rhein Kraft
data.processed: <story>……Nnnnnaaaaaa~~~!!

data.text: Kraft-san……seems to be quite deep in thought.
data.name: King Halo
data.processed: <story>Kraft-san……seems to be quite deep in thought.

data.text:
I've already told her everything I needed to. All that's left…… 
is to wait and see what answer she comes to.
data.name: <username>
data.processed:
<story>I've already told her everything I needed to. All that's left…… 
<story>is to wait and see what answer she comes to.

data.text:
I've already told her everything I needed to. All that's left…… 
is to wait and see what answer she comes to.
data.name: <username>
data.processed:
<story>I've already told her everything I needed to. All that's left…… 
<story>is to wait and see what answer she comes to.

data.text:
……That's true. In the end, the one that will be 
running in that race will be her. And the only 
one that can decide her path――will also be her.
data.name: King Halo
data.processed:
<story>……That's true. In the end, the one that will be 
<story>running in that race will be her. And the only 
<story>one that can decide her path――will also be her.

data.text: (Though……it might be best to have a chat with her as well――)
data.name: King Halo
data.processed: <story>(Though……it might be best to have a chat with her as well――)

data.text:
(Ahhh……in the end, 
training finished before I could figure it out……)
data.name: Rhein Kraft
data.processed:
<story>(Ahhh……in the end, 
<story>training finished before I could figure it out……)

data.text:
(But today, I was the only one that had a lighter 
training menu. Trainer-san was the one that did 
that, right? ……so I could think things through)
data.name: Rhein Kraft
data.processed:
<story>(But today, I was the only one that had a lighter 
<story>training menu. Trainer-san was the one that did 
<story>that, right? ……so I could think things through)

data.text: (My next race……my answer is――)
data.name: Rhein Kraft
data.processed: <story>(My next race……my answer is――)

data.text: Kraft, I have a request.
data.name: Cesario
data.processed: <story>Kraft, I have a request.

data.text:
I've gotten permission to go out at night. 
――I want you to do some parallel running with me.
data.name: Cesario
data.processed:
<story>I've gotten permission to go out at night. 
<story>――I want you to do some parallel running with me.

data.text: Eh……? O-okay. That's fine, but……
data.name: Rhein Kraft
data.processed: <story>Eh……? O-okay. That's fine, but……

data.text:
Fuuu~……Alright, I'm ready, Cesario! 
How many meters should we run?
data.name: Rhein Kraft
data.processed:
<story>Fuuu~……Alright, I'm ready, Cesario! 
<story>How many meters should we run?

data.text: ……How many do you want to run?
data.name: Cesario
data.processed: <story>……How many do you want to run?

data.text: Huh, me? But, Cesario wanted――
data.name: Rhein Kraft
data.processed: <story>Huh, me? But, Cesario wanted――

data.name: Cesario
data.processed: <story>…………

data.text:
……? Hmm……okay. 
I'll be the one to decide. ……Then――
data.name: Rhein Kraft
data.processed:
<story>……? Hmm……okay. 
<story>I'll be the one to decide. ……Then――

data.text: ……――2400m, please.
data.name: Rhein Kraft
data.processed: <story>……――2400m, please.

data.text: Understood. ……Let's begin.
data.name: Cesario
data.processed: <story>Understood. ……Let's begin.

data.text: Ready――Start!!
data.name: Cesario
data.processed: <story>Ready――Start!!

data.text: Haa, haa, haa, haa――!!
data.name: Rhein Kraft
data.processed: <story>Haa, haa, haa, haa――!!

data.text:
(What Trainer-san said……about my aptitude. I know. 
At this distance, I've never won once against Cesario.)
data.name: Rhein Kraft
data.processed:
<story>(What Trainer-san said……about my aptitude. I know. 
<story>At this distance, I've never won once against Cesario.)

data.name: Rhein Kraft
data.processed: <story>(But――……!!)

data.text: Yaaaaaaaーーー!!
data.name: Rhein Kraft
data.processed: <story>Yaaaaaaaーーー!!

data.name: Cesario
data.processed: <story>……!!

data.text: Haaa, haaa, haa……!!
data.name: Rhein Kraft
data.processed: <story>Haaa, haaa, haa……!!

data.text: ――It's my win.
data.name: Cesario
data.processed: <story>――It's my win.

data.text: Once more!!
data.name: Rhein Kraft
data.processed: <story>Once more!!

data.text:
Let's run……once more! 
The same distance! 2400m……!!
data.name: Rhein Kraft
data.processed:
<story>Let's run……once more! 
<story>The same distance! 2400m……!!

data.text:
(I know, I probably won't win this time either――but still! 
I can't back down at this point!)
data.name: Rhein Kraft
data.processed:
<story>(I know, I probably won't win this time either――but still! 
<story>I can't back down at this point!)

data.text:
(The Triple Tiara stage! 
Is my important aspiration……my dream……!!)
data.name: Rhein Kraft
data.processed:
<story>(The Triple Tiara stage! 
<story>Is my important aspiration……my dream……!!)

data.text: Please, Cesario! Once more……!!
data.name: Rhein Kraft
data.processed: <story>Please, Cesario! Once more……!!

data.text:
Understood. 2400m it is. 
……Let's go, Kraft.
data.name: Cesario
data.processed:
<story>Understood. 2400m it is. 
<story>……Let's go, Kraft.

data.text: ――Haaaaaaaa!
data.name: Rhein Kraft
data.processed: <story>――Haaaaaaaa!

data.text:
After that, Kraft repeatedly continued to challenge 
Cesario at the same distance as the 『Oaks』.
data.processed:
<story>After that, Kraft repeatedly continued to challenge 
<story>Cesario at the same distance as the 『Oaks』.

data.text: Haa-, Haa-……~~~ Once more!!
data.name: Rhein Kraft
data.processed: <story>Haa-, Haa-……~~~ Once more!!

data.text:
Fuuuu……as you wish. 
……However, let me give you a warning.
data.name: Cesario
data.processed:
<story>Fuuuu……as you wish. 
<story>……However, let me give you a warning.

data.text:
2400m――At the distance for the 『Oaks』, I won't let you. 
I won't ever let you finish in front of me, Kraft.
data.name: Cesario
data.processed:
<story>2400m――At the distance for the 『Oaks』, I won't let you. 
<story>I won't ever let you finish in front of me, Kraft.

data.text:
……I know. I know how you feel about 
the 『Oaks』, Cesario……! Even then!
data.name: Rhein Kraft
data.processed:
<story>……I know. I know how you feel about 
<story>the 『Oaks』, Cesario……! Even then!

data.text: ……Right. Let's continue.
data.name: Cesario
data.processed: <story>……Right. Let's continue.

data.text:
Haaa……haaaa…… 
Once……more……!!
data.name: Rhein Kraft
data.processed:
<story>Haaa……haaaa…… 
<story>Once……more……!!

data.text: Cough, cough!! ……~~Once……more……!!
data.name: Rhein Kraft
data.processed: <story>Cough, cough!! ……~~Once……more……!!

data.text: Haaa……hyuuu……once……more……
data.name: Rhein Kraft
data.processed: <story>Haaa……hyuuu……once……more……

data.text: ! ……Kraft!!
data.name: Cesario
data.processed: <story>! ……Kraft!!

data.text: ……How are you? Have you calmed down?
data.name: Cesario
data.processed: <story>……How are you? Have you calmed down?

data.text: Yeah……Thanks, Cesario……
data.name: Rhein Kraft
data.processed: <story>Yeah……Thanks, Cesario……

data.text:
I see, I'm glad. 
……Geez, you're quite the unreasonable Uma Musume, aren't you?
data.name: Cesario
data.processed:
<story>I see, I'm glad. 
<story>……Geez, you're quite the unreasonable Uma Musume, aren't you?

data.text:
However――『Believe, and keep trying』. That strength, 
that brilliance that you have, is truly one-of-a-kind.
data.name: Cesario
data.processed:
<story>However――『Believe, and keep trying』. That strength, 
<story>that brilliance that you have, is truly one-of-a-kind.

data.text:
……But that's precisely why. 
Don't you think that there's a path that only you can run?
data.name: Cesario
data.processed:
<story>……But that's precisely why. 
<story>Don't you think that there's a path that only you can run?

data.text: Eh――?
data.name: Rhein Kraft
data.processed: <story>Eh――?

data.text:
Participating in the 『NHK Mile Cup』, it seems like 
Trainer recommended that. ……I heard it from King-san.
data.name: Cesario
data.processed:
<story>Participating in the 『NHK Mile Cup』, it seems like 
<story>Trainer recommended that. ……I heard it from King-san.

data.text:
That race is the only G1 intersection between the 
Tiara and Triple Crown routes during the Classic year.
data.name: Cesario
data.processed:
<story>That race is the only G1 intersection between the 
<story>Tiara and Triple Crown routes during the Classic year.

data.text:
A place where the young competitors of the future 
come together to forge a new era――deciding who is the 
『Generation's Fastest』 ……That's the 『NHK Mile Cup』
data.name: Cesario
data.processed:
<story>A place where the young competitors of the future 
<story>come together to forge a new era――deciding who is the 
<story>『Generation's Fastest』 ……That's the 『NHK Mile Cup』

data.text: ! ……The generation's……fastest――
data.name: Rhein Kraft
data.processed: <story>! ……The generation's……fastest――

data.text:
……honestly, I think it's unfortunate too. Against 
you, on the Triple Tiara stage……at the 『Oaks』 and 
『Shuuka Sho』, I wanted to compete as rivals.
data.name: Cesario
data.processed:
<story>……honestly, I think it's unfortunate too. Against 
<story>you, on the Triple Tiara stage……at the 『Oaks』 and 
<story>『Shuuka Sho』, I wanted to compete as rivals.

data.text:
But, at the same time, as someone who finished the 
『Oka Sho』 behind you, I also think this: If it's you…… 
then maybe, that 『Speed』 can take you further.
data.name: Cesario
data.processed:
<story>But, at the same time, as someone who finished the 
<story>『Oka Sho』 behind you, I also think this: If it's you…… 
<story>then maybe, that 『Speed』 can take you further.

data.text:
By believing in yourself and accepting that challenge―― 
that you'll achieve an unparalleled brilliance.
data.name: Cesario
data.processed:
<story>By believing in yourself and accepting that challenge―― 
<story>that you'll achieve an unparalleled brilliance.

data.text:
Kraft. ……Think, aspire, believe and move forward. 
Use that strength of yours. Shine like noone else can.
data.name: Cesario
data.processed:
<story>Kraft. ……Think, aspire, believe and move forward. 
<story>Use that strength of yours. Shine like noone else can.

data.text:
The thing that will carry you towards your dream 
and beyond is both of those legs of yours.
data.name: Cesario
data.processed:
<story>The thing that will carry you towards your dream 
<story>and beyond is both of those legs of yours.

data.name: Rhein Kraft
data.processed: <story>……!!

data.text:
Just give it some thought Kraft. And about your aspirations, 
your dreams, and what you've seen so far along your journey.
data.name: <username>
data.processed:
<story>Just give it some thought Kraft. And about your aspirations, 
<story>your dreams, and what you've seen so far along your journey.

data.text:
Just give it some thought Kraft. And about your aspirations, 
your dreams, and what you've seen so far along your journey.
data.name: <username>
data.processed:
<story>Just give it some thought Kraft. And about your aspirations, 
<story>your dreams, and what you've seen so far along your journey.

data.text:
And then…… 
about a path that only you can run.
data.name: <username>
data.processed:
<story>And then…… 
<story>about a path that only you can run.

data.text:
And then…… 
about a path that only you can run.
data.name: <username>
data.processed:
<story>And then…… 
<story>about a path that only you can run.

data.text:
……I've always admired the Triple Tiara. And the wonderful 
miracles that the Uma Musume there left behind, were my dream.
data.name: Rhein Kraft
data.processed:
<story>……I've always admired the Triple Tiara. And the wonderful 
<story>miracles that the Uma Musume there left behind, were my dream.

data.text:
I admired the unshakeable strength of Air Groove-san. 
I admired the free-spirited brilliance of Sweep-san.
data.name: Rhein Kraft
data.processed:
<story>I admired the unshakeable strength of Air Groove-san. 
<story>I admired the free-spirited brilliance of Sweep-san.

data.text:
And many others. Chasing after the Uma Musume 
who came before me, my dream, aspiration, and 
emotions they linked together. ………But, that――
data.name: Rhein Kraft
data.processed:
<story>And many others. Chasing after the Uma Musume 
<story>who came before me, my dream, aspiration, and 
<story>emotions they linked together. ………But, that――

data.text:
Wasn't because I admired them just because they are 
『Uma Musume who ran for the Triple Tiara』. Because 
they were who they were, that's why I saw it as my dream!
data.name: Rhein Kraft
data.processed:
<story>Wasn't because I admired them just because they are 
<story>『Uma Musume who ran for the Triple Tiara』. Because 
<story>they were who they were, that's why I saw it as my dream!

data.text: ……In that case, then me too.
data.name: Rhein Kraft
data.processed: <story>……In that case, then me too.

data.text:
With my strength. To shine on my own. 
Running with these legs of mine, on my own path――
data.name: Rhein Kraft
data.processed:
<story>With my strength. To shine on my own. 
<story>Running with these legs of mine, on my own path――

data.text: I need to break open a one-of-a-kind road!
data.name: Rhein Kraft
data.processed: <story>I need to break open a one-of-a-kind road!

data.text:
……Thank you. Cesario. 
That's right, isn't it? ……I've decided.
data.name: Rhein Kraft
data.processed:
<story>……Thank you. Cesario. 
<story>That's right, isn't it? ……I've decided.

data.text:
I will take on a 『Path of my own』. 
And there, I'll carve my own name.
data.name: Rhein Kraft
data.processed:
<story>I will take on a 『Path of my own』. 
<story>And there, I'll carve my own name.

data.text:
I'll make them all want to chase after my 
brilliance, my footsteps, my strength!
data.name: Rhein Kraft
data.processed:
<story>I'll make them all want to chase after my 
<story>brilliance, my footsteps, my strength!

data.text: ……Do you think I'll be able to do it?
data.name: Rhein Kraft
data.processed: <story>……Do you think I'll be able to do it?

data.text:
You will. It's because they believe that 
you can, that Trainer showed you this path.
data.name: Cesario
data.processed:
<story>You will. It's because they believe that 
<story>you can, that Trainer showed you this path.

data.text:
Fufuu. ……Yeah, you're right! 
Trainer-san believes in me.
data.name: Rhein Kraft
data.processed:
<story>Fufuu. ……Yeah, you're right! 
<story>Trainer-san believes in me.

data.text:
I'll show them that I can do it. At the 『NHK Mile Cup』―― 
I'll become the 『Generation's Fastest』!
data.name: Rhein Kraft
data.processed:
<story>I'll show them that I can do it. At the 『NHK Mile Cup』―― 
<story>I'll become the 『Generation's Fastest』!
